name: Brute Clans
background: The Guilds of the Nexus are various factions of violent and deranged outlaws that wage eternal guild wars on the streets of the Nexus. These guilds are joined by mercenaries which are not bound to any particular guild, and which fight for anyone that can provide riches or a worthy cause.

sections.label: Replace Burst Pistols and Hand Weapon
Replace any Burst Pistols and Hand Weapon

spells.name: Wild Form
spells.effect: Target 2 friendly units within 12" get +1 to hit rolls next time they fight in melee.
spells.effectSkirmish: Target 2 friendly units within 12" get +1 to hit rolls next time they fight in melee.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 1 hit with AP(2).
spells.effectSkirmish: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 1 hit with AP(2).

spells.name: Protection
spells.effect: Target 4 friendly units within 12" get +1 to defense rolls next time they take hits.
spells.effectSkirmish: Target 4 friendly units within 12" get +1 to defense rolls next time they take hits.

spells.name: Leech
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 1 hit with AP(2) and Deadly(3).
spells.effectSkirmish: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 1 hit with AP(2) and Deadly(3).

spells.name: Magic Wind
spells.effect: Target 4 friendly units within 12" get +3" next time they Advance, or +6" next time they Rush/Charge.
spells.effectSkirmish: Target 4 friendly units within 12" get +3" next time they Advance, or +6" next time they Rush/Charge.

spells.name: Blood Hex
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 18” takes 2 hits with Blast(3).
spells.effectSkirmish: Target enemy unit within 18” takes 2 hits with Blast(3).

specialRules.name: Trample
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units that are within 12” at the beginning of the round get Impact(+1). This effect lasts until the end of the round.

specialRules.name: Warning Cry
specialRules.description: Enemy units  using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model.

specialRules.name: Bully
specialRules.description: Whenever a friendly unit within 12" fails a morale test that causes it to be Shaken or Routed, it counts as passed instead. Then, roll as many dice as the number of wounds it would take to check for wound effects, and for each result of 1-3 the unit takes one wound, which can't be ignored.
